title: [管理][娱乐][RPG]MCRPG——魔兽RPG[1.7.x]
author: qq867648970
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:01 编辑 

一个灵感来至于魔兽世界的插件
允许转载插件证明：





QQ图片20140702235806.jpg (132.4 KB, 下载次数: 261)

下载附件

2014-7-3 00:04 上传





插件简介:

Please note: Plugin is still in development, more stuff will be added to features as we add them to the plugin!You want your video featured on here? Make a tutorial or review of the plugin in english and link it as a comment and we'll feature it here! 
McRPG is a plugin that will make your whole server into a new role playing game!
With weapons, armor and items inspired by the enormous RPG World of Warcraft your server will draw forth players who will stay for a long while when enjoying this game-transforming plugin.
What this plugin basically does is creating and renaming several items, with new enchantments and recipes with inspiration from World of Warcraft. 
译文++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++请注意:插件还在修改中,更多的功能即将被加入插件中.你想你的视频出现这里吗？用英语评论插件和制作教程,我们将会给你特写MCRPG是一个让你的服务器进入全新的角色扮演游戏的插件.与护甲,武器和物品创建一个巨大的魔兽世界PRG服务器,让玩家来了就不想走,留下来享受这个插件.这和插件就是在基础创建并重命名多个物品.新的法术和新的食物灵感来自于游戏<魔兽世界>特色

New items - Inspired from World of Warcraft, craftable and obtainable.
新项目-灵感来自于游戏<魔兽世界>
Private whispers - You can send player private whispers, only visible to the sender and receiver.
私人聊天-你可以和玩家私聊,只能让对方看见你发送的信息
Classes - With different classes, you can choose what your character will become and what powers you will possess
种族-不同的种族,你可以选择你的种族,然后你会拥有权力.
Factions - With 2 different factions to choose, you can either become one of the fierce bad guys, or the team playing good guys!
派系-两个不同的派系选择,你可以选择成为坏人或者好人
Gold - Trade with players and earn gold by completing custom made achievements!
金—让玩家完成任务赚取金(货币)
Achievements - Earn gold by the custom achievements this plugin offers!
成就-赚取金来之这个插件提供成就
More features will be added as we implement them into the plugin
更多的功能将被加入插件并实现他们
命令

Commands 
/rpg help - Shows all availible commands
列出所有插件指令
/w <player> <message> - Sends a whisper to selected player
向某个玩家私聊
/y <message> - Sends out a server-wide yell
发送呐喊
/supply <player> <item> - Give the specified player a item. (Only items that McRPG implements)
给予玩家一个指定的物品(只有在MCRPG存在的物品)
/heal <player> - Heals specified player, just typing /heal will automatically set you as target.
治愈某个玩家
/class <mage/paladin/warrior> - Selects your class.
选择你的种类<法师/圣骑士/战士>
/ci <player> - Clears inventory of selected player.
清理玩家数据
/gm <0/1/survival/creative> <player> - Sets players gamemode.
改变玩家的生存状态
/setspawn - Sets server-spawn.
设置出生点
/spawn - Teleports you to spawn.
传送到出生点
/faction <Horde/Alliance> - Choose which faction you want to fight for!
选择你的阵营<部落/联盟>
/vanish - Toggles your invisibility.
切换隐身状态
/balance - Shows how much gold you have.
查看你的金(货币)
/achievement - Opens up the achievement-list.
打开你的成就列表
种族

Warrior - Fight as a warrior and slay your enemies with no mercy!
战士-作为战士你杀敌时应该毫不留情
Mage - Play as a Mage, a wise wizard with magical powers.
法师-作为一个法师,一个拥有神奇力量的先知
Paladin - Follow the light's guidance and fight off your enemies with the power of the light!
圣骑士——遵循光的指导和与光的力量击退敌人!
阵营

Horde - Fight with brutality for the horde, for the magestive warchief Orgrim Doomhammer
部落——部落是残忍的野蛮人
Alliance - Fight honorably for the allmighty king Varian Wryn
联盟——联盟是有国王的完整组织
权限
权限只有一个:
mcrpg.admin     ——MCRPG插件管理员权限
配置文件解读:
# Default configuration for McRPG
# McRPG的默认配置
# Read through and change what's needed before publicing on your server for other players!
# 在你的服务器开放给玩家之前请通读以下内容并对你的服务器进行设置
# To disable something, change the 'enable' to 'disable' vice versa.
# 如要关闭某些东西，请将“enable”更改为“disable”反之亦然


# AUTO-UPDATE
# 自动更新
# Do you want the plugin to update automatically if there's an update available everytime you reload?
# 你是否想每次当插件有可用更新时重新加载就自动更新？
# auto = Will download the latest update if you're running a outdated one automatically.
# auto = 当你运行旧版本时将会自动更新
# notify = Will not download anything, but will tell you if there's a new version available.
# notify = 当有可用的新版本时不会下载，但会通知你
# disable = Will not do anything.
# disable = 什么也不做
auto_update: notify

# Send the player a welcome-message when joining?
# 当玩家加入时是否发送欢迎信息？
# If enable it will send the player a message
# 如果enable它会发送给这个玩家信息
welcome_msg: enable

# If welcome_msg is 'enable', then what should the message be?
# 如果welcome_msg 'enable', 那会是什么信息？
# %player% is playername.
# %player% 是玩家名.
# To use colors, type & and then the COLOR CODE. Find all at: http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes#Color_codes
# 要使用的颜色, 类型 & 和颜色代码. 去以下地址寻找: http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes#Color_codes
MOTD: '&6&oDarion whispers: Welcome to the server, %player%.'


##################################
#                           聊天               #
##################################

# This is for enabling or disabling the colors in chat, for instance if someone types &2Hello it will show the message in green.
# 这是控制在聊天时启用的颜色的功能, 假设某人设置为types &2Hello 那他聊天的时候将会是绿色信息
# Disabling this will NOT disable the colors for other messages, such as MOTD or other plugin messages. Only player-sent messages.
# 如果设置为Disable它只针对玩家发送的信息，并不会关闭其他motd或者插件的消息颜色
chat_colors: enable

# Make the /y <message> command only availible to players with admin permission? (mcrpg.admin)
# 是否只有管理员权限的玩家才能使用/y <message>这个命令 (mcrpg.admin)
admin_yell: disable

# This will set how the chat is displayed. You can set where the username is supposed to be and in what color anything should be in.
# 聊天显示设置 你可以设置某个用户名为某个颜色

# Below are some variables that might help you formatting the chat.
# 下面是一些变量，可使您的聊天内容格式化
# %player% = Playername
# %player% = 用户名
# %message% = The message itself
# %message% = 信息内容
# %faction% = The player's faction
# %faction% = 玩家阵营
# %class% = The player's class
# %class% = 玩家种类
# %op% = OP-prefix. (Only shows if player is OP).
# %op% = OP的前缀. (如果该玩家是OP).
chat_formatting: '%op% %faction% &a%class%?[%player%] says: %message%'
自动更新(这段不翻译了)


Auto updating is a new feature in McRPG, first introduced in version beta 1.1!
What it basically is, is a function that can either download the new file automatically when there's a new file available on BukkitDev. Or it can only send you a message upon login if there's a new version available, or you can just shut it off completely!
How to configure this is very easy, you simply need to open the Config.yml, then look for auto_updater and set it to one of these variables, depending on what you want:
notify (Default!) - It will send you a notification message upon login and on startup!

disabled - It will not do anything! Not even initialize and connect to the server.

auto - It will automatically download the latest file and install it, if there is one available.

怎么更新插件

This is the best way to update, follow these steps to update the plugin:
Download the latest .jar fileCopy everything inside your config.ymlPlace the new .jar file inside your <server-folder>\plugins\ folder and replace the old oneDelete the current config.yml fileRun the server (the plugin will now generate a new config-file that's up to date)Paste the copied (old) config.yml into a new notepad fileChange the settings that's in the old to the new config file.
Q: Why is it so complicated?
A: Well since the plugin is still in development, we add a bunch of new things to the config-file almost after every update. The config file doesn't automatically update when the plugin does, therefor these steps are required to maintain the plugin in full capabilitiy 
这是更新的最佳方法,按照以下步骤更新插件:
下载最新的jar文件
复制的config.yml文件
替换新的jar文件
删除当前的config.yml文件
运行服务器的插件将生成一个新config.yml文件
粘贴复制(旧)config.yml到一个新配置文件
把旧的设置替换新的设置
问:为什么这么复杂?
答:因为插件仍在开发中,我们在每次更新后添加新的内容到config-file。配置文件不自动更,所以就需要这些步骤更新日志

Implement factions
Different spawn for each classes
Powers for classes (Perhaps)
Add classes
Add gold (Currency)
关于汉化

由于该插件还在不断更新,不断修改中,所以我会在插件版本稳定后给予汉化.请大家谅解


最后：插件看起来比较复杂,具体内容还需要大家去游戏里亲自测试~我已经测试过,这个插件让MC变成了真正的RPG~集职业,阵营,任务多种功能于一身.
